text: If anything, he had merely become a little more reserved, and much more polite. I wanted only to go upstairs to bed. I had long since become accustomed, and now addicted, to an after-curry nap.
handwritten_text: If anything, he had merely become a little more reserved, and much more polite. I wanted only to go upstairs to bed. I had long since become accustomed, and now addicted, to an after-curry nap.
